mapper.insert: insert into member (memberNum, memberEmail, memberName, memberPassword, memberGender, memberPhoneNum, memberRegDate) values ( (select *from (select max(memberNum)+1 from member) next), #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberGender}, #{memberPhoneNum}, #{memberRegDate})
mapper.select: select * from emailKey where email = #{email} and ( checkDate > date_add(now(), interval -1 hour)) order by checkDate DESC limit 1
